management.name: Al Amin
management.bio: 15 years of football management experience. Former professional player with extensive coaching credentials. Al Amin holds a UEFA A license and has developed numerous players who have gone on to professional careers.

management.name: Shakirul Goush
management.bio: As chairman, Shakirul provides strategic direction and oversight for the academy. With a background in sports management and business administration, he ensures the academy operates at the highest standards.

management.name: Imran Bin Ahad
management.bio: Imran oversees the day-to-day operations of the academy. With a degree in Sports Science and 10 years of experience in football administration, he ensures smooth functioning of all programs and facilities.

management.name: Sayid Shah
management.bio: Sayid assists the General Secretary in overseeing the academy's operations. With a background in Sports Management, he plays a key role in ensuring the academy runs smoothly.
